articles.title: The Red Cross Is Asking Players To Stop Committing War Crimes In Games - TheGamer
articles.description: The Red Cross has teamed up with streamers to help convince gamers to play games without committing virtual war crimes.
articles.content: A lot of popular video games are rooted in players picking up controllers and fighting in virtual wars. Not only does that describe every single Call of Duty game ever made, but its battle royale spi… [+2621 chars]
